title: Toy Ruler Azir
body: The idea is that is is a Toy Castle ruler, and his soldiers look like a nutcracker, my friend drew this up after I asked him to make a sketch of it

replies.body:
So either you're a friend of Vega or you're a liar or your friend's a liar...

I'm leaning toward you being the teller of falsehoods here.  Is internet "fame" really that valuable to you?

I downvoted this simply because it provides no link to the original artwork, despite the fact that I love the artwork itself.

Wait i thought this idea was created by Vega colors. She made a bunch of great art with it (can be seen here http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1426621331103/SkinSketches3%5BWIP%5D.jpg . I'm not sure if you her friend or not but by how secretive you were of here even though you could have mentioned he DA is kinda of suspicious.
{{summoner:4}} ( i'm out)

Well the picture from above was posted 2 months ago by VegaColors by fans on Reddit and you posted this pretty late. So im just confused how your friend drew it. unless it was a while ago and you decided to post it now. That still doesn't explain why not just show all the pictures and just the toy solider one.
{{champion:32}}  (I don't understand)

I'm proud of everyone for politely calling this person out with reason and facts instead of just unloading on them.  That said, trying to steal someone else's work for internet points is pretty lame.  :-/
Hey, I didn't really know until now, I'm actually yelling at my friend over skype
Who is your friend that drew these?
Why would you like to know?

> [{quoted}](name=MLN Fluttershy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=FoRyB6mI,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-31T00:35:27.881+0000)
>
> Why would you like to know?

I'm just wondering. The artwork is very nice. Did you think up this idea or was it your friends idea?
I thought of the idea, but my friend drew it, along side some others, if you want to see them also

Are you lying?

Edit: Why lie? You didn't even do a good job of snipping the picture to hide underworld azir. 
Why not just say the concept was by vegacolors?

This.
This is amazing.
Not just the idea but the look, I mean, using a little gun with a knife-tip(whatever its called) is just awesome. Though the star on the rod kinda offs me.
+1 though
Sorry for the terrible quality of the picture, I hope it look alright anyways tho
